short_summary: Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer for Material Testing Services in various locations across Newfoundland and Labrador.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the provision of Material Testing Services in various locations across Newfoundland and Labrador.  The work consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and materials to carry out material testing in various locations throughout Newfoundland and Labrador. The term for the Regional Individual Standing Offer is for two (2) years, on an ‘as and when required basis’. The estimated value for this opportunity is in the range of $100,001 to $500,000.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title

* English: RISO-EA003-241789: Materials Testing Services - Various Locations in Newfoundland and Labrador
* French: OCIR – EA003-241789: Services de mise à l’essai des matériaux – Divers emplacements, Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador

### Reference Number and Modification

* Reference Number: WS4507611578, Document 4530775184
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS4507611578
* Publication Date: April 10, 2024
* Amendment Date: May 6, 2024

### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: May 7, 2024, 2:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Tender Status: Expired
* Goods and Services Information:
	+ Goods and Services Information: 81141503 (Materials or product inspection)
	+ Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ City: Gatineau
	+ Province: Quebec
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	+ Country: Canada

### Opportunities

* Opportunities: None

### Regions of Delivery

* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador

### Contact Information

* Contact: Gary Bryant
* Email: gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

[Link to Tender Notice](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19364438?extsite=MTkzNjQ0MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notes

* The estimated value for this opportunity is in the range of $100,001 to $500
